text: whw aladhi skhkhar lakum albhr; litakuluu mimaa tstadwn min smkh lhmana tryana, watastakhrijuu minh zynt talbaswnha kallwlw walmrjan, wataraa alsufun aleazimat tshq wajah alma' tadhhab wtjy', wtrkbwnha; lttlbu rizq allah baltjart walrbh fyha, walaealakum tashkurun lilah taealaa ealaa eazim 'ineamh elykm, fala taebudun ghyrh
